original: thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti ayaṃ mātikānikkhepo. Tesaṃ mātikāya vitthārabhājanaṃ.
analyzed: thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ ti ayam mātikā nikkhepo tesam mātikāya vitthāra bhājanam

original: Vāsanā bhavissatīti vāsanāvahaṃ bhavissati. Sineruṃ ukkhipanto viyātiādi imissā desanāya
analyzed: vāsanā bhavissati iti vāsanāvaham bhavissati sinerum ukkhipantaḥ viya āti ādi imissā desanāya

original: anaññasādhāraṇatāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ.
analyzed: anañña sādhāraṇa tāya su dukkara bhāva dassanam

original: Mañcaṭṭhesu mañcasamaññā viya mukhaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ “mukha”nti adhippetaṃ. Sukkhakaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato
analyzed: mañcaṭṭhesu mañca samaññā viya mukhaṭṭham visam mukhanti adhippetam sukkha kaṭṭha sadisa bhāva āpādanato

original: “kaṭṭha”nti vuccatīti kaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ etassāti kaṭṭhamukho, daṃsanādinā kaṭṭhasadisabhāvakaro
analyzed: kaṭṭhanti vuccati iti kaṭṭham mukham etassa ati kaṭṭhamukhaḥ daṃsana ādinā kaṭṭha sadisa bhāva karo

original: sappo. Atha vā kaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato kaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ vā mukhe etassāti kaṭṭhamukho.
analyzed: sappaḥ atha vā kaṭṭha sadisa bhāva āpādanato kaṭṭham visam vā mukhe etassa ati kaṭṭhamukho

original: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo. Ime cattāroti ime visakiccabhedena cattāro.
analyzed: iminā nayena sesa padesu pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ime cattāraḥ ti ime visa kicca bhedena cattāro

original: Idāni taṃ nesaṃ visakiccabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayasūlasamappitaṃ viyāti
analyzed: idāni tam visa kicca bhedam dassetum tesu itiādi vuttam aya sūla samappitam viyā

original: abbhantare ayasūlaṃ anuppavesitaṃ viya. Pakkapūtipanasaṃ viyāti paccitvā kālātikkame
analyzed: abbhantare aya sūlam an uppavesitam viya pakka pūti panasam viya ati paccitvā kāla atikkame

original: kuthitapanasaphalaṃ viya. Caṅgavāreti rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvane surāparissāvane
analyzed: kuthita panasa phalam viya rajakānam khāra parissāvane surā parissāvane

original: vā. Anavasesaṃ chijjanena asanipātaṭṭhānaṃ viya. Mahānikhādanenāti mahantena nikhādanena.
analyzed: vā anavasesam chijjanena asanipāta ṭṭhānam viya mahā nikhādanena ati mahantena nikhādanena

original: Visavegavikārenāti visavegagatena vikārena. Vātenāti tassa sappassa sarīraṃ phusitvā
analyzed: visa vega vikārena ati visa vega gatena vikārena vātena ati tassa sappassa sarīram phusitvā

original: uggatavātena. Nāsavāte pana vattabbameva natthi. Puggalapaṇṇattivasenāti tesaṃyeva
analyzed: uggata vātena nāsa vāte pana vattabbam eva natthi puggala paṇṇatti vasena ati tesam yeva

original: soḷasannaṃ sappānaṃ āgatavisotiādipuggalanāmassa vasena catusaṭṭhi honti paccekaṃ
analyzed: soḷasannam sappānam āgata viso ti ādi puggala nāmassa vasena honti paccekam

original: catubbidhabhāvato. Āgatavisoti āgacchaviso, sīghataraṃ abhiruhanavisoti attho. Ghoravisoti
analyzed: catubbidha bhāvataḥ āgataviso ti āgacchaviso sīghataram abhiruhana viso ti attho ghora viso ti

original: kakkhaḷaviso, duttikicchaviso. Ayaṃ sītaudakaṃ viya hoti gāḷhadubbinimmocayabhāvena.
analyzed: kakkhaḷa visaḥ dutti kiccha visaḥ ayam sītā udakam viya hoti gāḷha dubbinimmocaya bhāvena

original: Udakasappo hi ghoraviso hoti yevāti vuttaṃ – “udakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viyā”ti. Paññāyatīti
analyzed: udaka sappaḥ hi ghora visaḥ hoti yeva ati vuttam udaka sappa ādīnam visam viya ati paññāyati iti

original: gaṇḍapiḷakādivasena paññāyati. Aneḷakasappo nāma mahāāsīviso. Nīlasappo nāma sākhavaṇṇo
analyzed: gaṇḍa piḷaka ādi vasena paññāyati aneḷakasappaḥ nāma mahā āsīvisaḥ nīlasappaḥ nāma sākhavaṇṇo

original: rukkhaggādīsu vicaraṇakasappo. Iminā upāyenāti yoyaṃ kaṭṭhamukhesu daṭṭhavisānaṃyeva
analyzed: rukkha agga ādīsu vicaraṇaka sappaḥ iminā upāyena ati yaḥ yam kaṭṭha mukhesu

original: “āgataviso no ghoraviso”tiādinā catubbidhabhāvo vutto, iminā upāyena. Kaṭṭhamukhe
analyzed: āgata visaḥ no ghora visaḥ ti ādinā catubbidha bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ iminā upāyena kaṭṭha mukhe

original: daṭṭhavisādayoti kaṭṭhamukhesu daṭṭhaviso, phuṭṭhaviso, vātavibhoti tayo, pūtimukhādīsu
analyzed: daṭṭha visa ādayo ti kaṭṭha mukhesu daṭṭha visaḥ phuṭṭha visaḥ vāta vibho ti tayo pūti mukha ādīsu

original: ca daṭṭhavisādayo cattāro cattāro veditabbo.
analyzed: ca daṭṭha visa ādayo cattāro cattāro veditabbo

original: Ekekanti catusaṭṭhiyo ekekaṃ. Catudhāti aṇḍajādivibhāgena catudhā vibhajitvā. Chapaṇṇāsānīti
analyzed: ekekam ti ekekam catudhā iti aṇḍaja ādi vibhāgena catudhā vibhajitvā cha paṇṇāsāni iti

original: chapaṇṇāsādhikāni. Gatamaggassāti yathāvuttasaṅkhyāgatamaggassa paṭilomato saṃkhippamānā
analyzed: cha paṇṇa asādhikāni gata maggassa ati yathā vutta saṅkhyā gata maggassa paṭilomataḥ saṃkhippamānā

original: anukkamena cattārova honti. Kulavasenāti kaṭṭhamukhādijātivasena.
analyzed: anukkamena cattāraḥ eva honti kula vasena ati kaṭṭha mukha ādi jāti vasena

original: Sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitavisāti hi tesaṃ phuṭṭhavisatā, vātavisatā vuccati.
analyzed: sakala kāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapita visā ati hi tesam phuṭṭha visa tā vāta visa tā vuccati

original: Evanti “āsittavisā”tiādinā. Etthāti āsīvisasadde vacanattho niruttinayena veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ti āsittavisā iti ādinā ettha ati āsīvisa sadde vacana atthaḥ nirutti nayena veditabbo

original: Uggatatejāti udaggatejā, attano visatejena nesaṃ kurūradabbatā vā. Dunnimmaddanavisāti
analyzed: uggata tejā ati udagga tejāḥ attanaḥ visa tejena vā

original: mantāgadehi animmaddanīyavisā. Cattāro āsīvisāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tenettha
analyzed: mantā gadehi cattāro āsīvisā ti ettha iti saddo ādi attho tena ittha

original: avasesapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: avasesa pāḷim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Āsīvisesūti ime āsīvisā daṭṭhavisā evāti veditabbā. Sarīraṭṭhakesuyevāti tena purisena
analyzed: āsīvisesu iti ime āsīvisāḥ daṭṭha visāḥ evā ti veditabbā tena purisena

original: tesaṃ kassaci aniṭṭhassa akatattā āyusesassa ca vijjamānattā naṃ na daṃsiṃsūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tesam kassaci aniṭṭhassa a kata ttā āyu sesassa ca vijjamāna ttā nam na daṃsiṃsu iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Pucchi yathābhūtaṃ pavedetukāmo. Durupaṭṭhāhāti durupaṭṭhānā. Sotthimaggoti sotthibhāvassa upāyo.
analyzed: pucchi yathābhūtam pavedetu kāmaḥ durupaṭṭhā aha ati durupaṭṭhānā sotthi maggā iti sotthi bhāvassa upāyaḥ

original: Antaracaroti antaraṃ caro sukhasattu vissāsaghātī. Tenāha “vadhako”ti. Idāni tāsaṃ
analyzed: antara caro ti antaram caro sukha sattu vissāsa ghātī tena āha vadhakaḥ iti idāni tāsam

original: pesane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhama”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Abhimukhagataṃ viya abhimukhagataṃ.
analyzed: pesane kāraṇam dassetum paṭhama ntiādi vuttam abhimukha gatam viya abhimukha gatam

original: Īdisīpi hi vacoyutti loke nirūpīyati santiyaṃ purisaṃ ṭhapetīti viya. Tasmā abhimukhagatanti
analyzed: īdisī ipi hi vacoyutti loke nirūpīyati tasmai

original: abhimukhaṃ tena sampattanti attho. Vaṅkasaṇṭhānaṃ phalakaṃ rukkhamūle āgatāgatānaṃ
analyzed: abhimukham tena sampattanti atthaḥ vaṅka saṇṭhānam phalakam rukkha mūle āgata āgatānam

original: nisīdanatthāya atthataṃ.
analyzed: nisīdana tthāya atthatam

original: Arittahattho puriso santāreti etāyāti santāraṇī. Orimatīrato uttaraṇāya setu uttarasetu.
analyzed: arittahatthaḥ puriso santāreti etāyā ati santāraṇī uttaraṇāya setu uttara setu

original: Ekena dvīhi vā gantabbo rukkhamayo setu rukkhasetu. Jaṅghasatthena gamanayoggo setu
analyzed: ekena dvīhi vā gantabbaḥ rukkha mayaḥ setu rukkha setu jaṅgha satthena gamana yoggo setu

original: jaṅghasetu. Sakaṭena gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyo sakaṭasetu. Na kho esa brāhmaṇo paramatthato.
analyzed: jaṅgha setu sakaṭena gantum sakkuṇeyyaḥ sakaṭa setu na kho esa brāhmaṇaḥ paramatthato

original: Tadattho pana ekadesena sambhavatīti tathā vuttanti dassento “ettakānaṃ paccatthikānaṃ
analyzed: tad atthaḥ pana eka desena sambhavati iti tathā vuttanti dassento ettakānam paccatthikānam

original: bāhitattā”ti āha. Desananti uddesadesanaṃ. Vinivattentoti paṭisaṃharanto. Na laddho
analyzed: bāhita ttā iti āha desanam ti uddesa desanam vinivattentaḥ iti paṭisaṃharantaḥ na laddhaḥ

original: vatāsīti na laddho vata āsi.
analyzed: vatā asi iti na laddhaḥ vata āsi

original: Rājā viya kammaṃ sattesu issariyassa vattāpanato. Rājā…pe… puthujjano vaṭṭadukkhasaṅkhātāparādhatāya.
analyzed: rājā viya kammam sattesu issariyassa puthujjanaḥ vaṭṭa dukkha saṅkhāta aparādha tāya

original: Ñāṇapalāyanenāti mahābhūtehi nibbinditvā virajjitvā vimuccitukāmatāvasena uppannañāṇapalāyane
analyzed: ñāṇa palāyanena ati mahābhūtehi nibbinditvā virajjitvā vimuccitu kāma tā vasena uppanna ñāṇa palāyane

original: maggādhigamasiddheneva ñāṇapalāyanena. Evañhettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpitameva hoti.
analyzed: magga adhigama siddhena iva ñāṇa palāyanena evañhi itthā upamā saṃsandanam matthakam pāpitam eva hoti

original: Yatheva hītiādinā ekadesanāsamudāyassa nidassanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Yathāvuttavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
analyzed: yathā iva hi iti ādinā eka desanā samudāyassa nidassanam āraddham yathā vutta vacanam aṭṭhakathā cariyānam

original: vacanena samattheti “patthaddho bhavatī”tiādinā. Tattha kaṭṭhamukhena vāti vā-saddo
analyzed: vacanena samatthā iti patthaddhaḥ bhavati itiādinā tattha kaṭṭha mukhena vā ati vāsaddaḥ

original: upamattho. Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena daṭṭho patthaddho hoti, evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena
analyzed: upamatthaḥ yathā kaṭṭha mukhena sappena daṭṭhaḥ patthaddhaḥ hoti evam pathavī dhātu pakopena

original: so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti, kaṭṭhamukhagato viya patthaddho hotīti attho. Atha vā
analyzed: so kāyaḥ kaṭṭha mukhā iva hoti kaṭṭha mukha gataḥ viya patthaddhaḥ hoti iti atthaḥ atha vā

original: vā-saddo avadhāraṇattho. So “pathavīdhātupakopena vā”ti evaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbo.
analyzed: vā saddaḥ avadhāraṇa attho so pathavī dhātu pakopena vā ati evam ānetvā sambandhitabbo

original: Ayañhettha attho – kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho
analyzed: ayam ha ittha atthaḥ kaṭṭha mukhena daṭṭhaḥ api kāyaḥ pathavī dhātu pakopena iva patthaddhaḥ

original: hoti, tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhagato viya hotīti.
analyzed: hoti tasmā pathavī dhātuyā a viyuttaḥ so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭha mukha gataḥ viya hoti iti

original: Vā-saddo vā aniyamattho. Tatrāyamattho – kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti
analyzed: vā saddaḥ vā aniyama atthaḥ tatra ayam atthaḥ kaṭṭha mukhena daṭṭhaḥ kāyaḥ patthaddhaḥ hoti

original: vā, na vā mantāgadavasena. Pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhagato
analyzed: vā na vā mantāgada vasena pathavī dhātu pakopena pana mantāgada rahito so kāyo kaṭṭha mukha gato

original: viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti. Tattha kāyoti pakatikāyo. Pūtikoti kuthito. Santattoti
analyzed: viya hoti ekanta patthaddho ti tattha kāyo ti pakati kāyo pūtiko ti kuthitaḥ santatto ti

original: sabbaso tatto mahādāhappatto. Sañchinnoti sabbaso chinno cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhūto. Yadā
analyzed: sabbaso tattas mahā dāha ppatto sañchinno ti sabbaso chinnaḥ cuṇṇa vicuṇṇa bhūtaḥ yadā

original: kāyo patthaddhādibhāvappatto hoti, tadā puriso kaṭṭhamukhādisappassa mukhe vattamāno viya hotīti attho.
analyzed: kāyaḥ patthaddha ādi bhāva ppattaḥ hoti tadā puriso kaṭṭha mukha ādi sappassa mukhe vattamānaḥ viya hoti iti attho

original: Visesatoti kaṭṭhamukhādivisesato ca pathavīādivisesato ca. Anatthaggahaṇatotiādi
analyzed: visesato ti kaṭṭha mukha ādi visesato ca pathavī ādi visesato ca anattha ggahaṇato tiādi

original: acetanesupi bhūtesu sacetanesu viya anatthādīnaṃ paccakkhatāya nibbedajananatthaṃ
analyzed: acetanesu pi bhūtesu sa cetanesu viya anattha ādīnam paccakkha tāya nibbeda janana attham

original: āraddhaṃ. Tattha āsayatoti pavattiṭṭhānato. Etesanti mahābhūtānaṃ. Sadisatāti vammikāsayasusiragahanasaṅkāraṭṭhānāsayatāya ca sadisatā.
analyzed: āraddham tattha āsayato ti pavatti ṭṭhānataḥ etesan ti mahābhūtānam sadisa tā ati vammika āsaya susira gahana saṅkāra ṭṭhāna āsaya tāya ca sadisa tā

original: Paccattalakkhaṇavasenāti visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇavasena. Pathavīādīnaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvādi,
analyzed: paccatta lakkhaṇa vasena ati visum visum lakkhaṇa vasena pathavī ādīnam kakkhaḷa bhāva ādi

original: taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa kakkhaḷabhāvāpādanādinā vikāruppādanato visavegavikārato sadisatā veditabbā.
analyzed: tad samaṅgino puggalassa kakkhaḷa bhāva āpādana ādinā vikāra uppādanataḥ visa vega vikārataḥ sadisa tā veditabbā

original: Anatthāti byasanā. Byādhinti kuṭṭhādibyādhiṃ. Bhave jātābhinandinoti bhavesu jātiyā abhinandanasīlā. Pañcavokāre hi jātiyā abhinandanā nāma mahābhūtābhinandanā eva.
analyzed: anatthā ati byasanā byādhinti kuṭṭha ādi byādhim bhave jāta abhinandino ti bhavesu jātiyā abhinandana sīlā pañcavokāre hi jātiyā abhinandanā nāma mahābhūta abhinandanā eva

original: Durupaṭṭhānatarānīti duppaṭikāratarāni. Durāsadāti durupasaṅkamanā. “Upaṭṭhāmī”ti
analyzed: durupaṭṭhānatarāni iti duppaṭikāratarāni durāsadā ati durupasaṅkamanāḥ upaṭṭhāmi iti

original: upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkonti. Parijānāma kammanāmāni, upakārā nāma natthi. Anantadosūpaddavatoti
analyzed: upasaṅkamitum na sakkonti parijānāma kamma nāmāni upakārāḥ nāma natthi ananta dosūpaddavato ti

original: aparimāṇadosūpaddavahetuto. Ekapakkhalanti ekadukkhaṃ.
analyzed: aparimāṇa dosa upaddava hetutaḥ eka pakkhalanti eka dukkham

original: Rūpakkhandho bhijjamāno cattāro arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati arūpakkhandhānaṃ
analyzed: rūpa kkhandhaḥ bhijjamānaḥ cattāraḥ arūpa kkhandhe gahetvā ava bhijjati arūpa kkhandhānam

original: ekanirodhattā. Vatthurūpampi gahetvāva bhijjanti pañcavokāre arūpakkhandhesu bhinnesu
analyzed: eka nirodha ttā vatthu rūpam pi gahetvā ava bhijjanti pañcavokāre arūpa khandhesu bhinnesu

original: rūpakkhandhassa avaṭṭhānābhāvato. Ettāvatāti lobhuppādanamattena. Paññā nāma attabhāve
analyzed: rūpa kkhandhassa avaṭṭhāna abhāvato ettāvatā ati lobha uppādana mattena paññā nāma attabhāve

original: uttamaṅgaṃ paññuttarattā kusaladhammānaṃ, sati ca kilesuppattiyaṃ paññāya anuppajjanato
analyzed: uttamaṅgam paññuttara ttā kusala dhammānam sati ca kilesa uppattiyam paññāya an uppajjanato

original: vuttaṃ – “ettāvatā paññāsīsaṃ patitaṃ nāma hotī”ti. Yoniyo upaneti tadupagassa kammapaccayassa
analyzed: vuttam ettāvatā paññāsīsam patitam nāma hoti iti yoniyaḥ upaneti tad upagassa kamma paccayassa

original: bhāve. “Jātibhayaṃ, jarābhayaṃ, maraṇabhayaṃ, corabhaya”ntiādinā āgatāni pañcavīsati
analyzed: bhāve jāti bhayam jarā bhayam maraṇa bhayam āgatāni pañcavīsati

original: mahābhayāni, “hatthampi chindatī”tiādinā āgatāni dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇāni āgatāneva
analyzed: mahā bhayāni hattham pi chindati iti ādinā āgatāni dvattiṃsa kamma kāraṇāni āgatān eva

original: honti kāraṇassa samavaṭṭhitattā. Nandīrāgo saṅkhārakkhandhoti saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannattā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: honti kāraṇassa samavaṭṭhita ttā nandī rāgaḥ saṅkhāra kkhandho ti saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpanna ttā vuttam

original: Pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatā “cakkhuto cepi naṃ, bhikkhave”tiādinā. Kiñci alabhitvāti tasmiṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam yeva āgatā cakkhutaḥ ce pi nam bhikkhave iti ādinā kiñci a labhitvā ti tasmin

original: suññagāme corānaṃ gayhūpagassa alābhavacaneneva tassa purisassa attano paṭisaraṇassa
analyzed: suñña gāme corānam gayhūpagassa alābha vacanena iva tassa purisassa attano paṭisaraṇassa

original: alābho vutto eva hotīti na uddhaṭo, purisaṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu, corā pana bāhirāyatanaṭṭhāniyā.
analyzed: alābhaḥ vuttaḥ eva hoti iti na uddhaṭaḥ purisa ṭṭhāniyaḥ bhikkhu corā pana bāhira āyatana ṭṭhāniyā

original: Abhinivisitvāti vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā. Ajjhattikāyatanavasena desanāya āgatattā
analyzed: abhinivisitvā iti vipassanā abhinivesam katvā ajjhattika āyatana vasena desanāya āgata ttā

original: Samaṃ samphusate bhūmiṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya. Yadipi bhūmiṃ samaṃ phusati, rajasā

original: nupalippati sukhumattā chaviyā. Ninnaṭṭhānaṃ unnamatītiādi buddhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāsaṅkhātamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭilābhassa
analyzed: nupalippati sukhuma tā chaviyā ninna ṭṭhānam unnamati itiādi buddhānam su patiṭṭhita pāda tā saṅkhāta mahāpurisa lakkhaṇa paṭilābhassa

original: nissandaphalaṃ. Nātidūre uddharatīti atidūre ṭhapetuṃ na uddharati. Naccāsanne ca
analyzed: nissanda phalam na atidūre uddharati iti atidūre na uddharati na ca āsanne ca

original: nikkhipanti accāsanne ca ṭhāne anikkhipanto niyyāti. Hāsayanto sadevake loke tosento.
analyzed: nikkhipanti acca āsanne ca ṭhāne a nikkhipantaḥ niyyāti hāsayantaḥ sa devake loke tosento

original: Catūhi pādehi caratīti catucārī.
analyzed: catūhi pādehi carati iti catu cārī

original: Buddhānubhāvassa pakāsanavasena gatattā vaṇṇakālo nāma esa. Sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe
analyzed: buddha anubhāvassa pakāsana vasena gata ttā vaṇṇa kālaḥ nāma esa sarīra vaṇṇe vā guṇa vaṇṇe

original: vā kathiyamāne dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Appamāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā bhagavanto,
analyzed: vā kathiyamāne dukkathitam ti na vattabbam kasmā appamāṇa vaṇṇāḥ hi buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: buddhaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanā jānantassa yathāraddhasaṃvaṇṇanaṃyeva anupavisati. Dukūlacumbaṭakenāti
analyzed: buddha guṇa saṃvaṇṇanāḥ jānantassa yathā āraddha saṃvaṇṇanaṃ yā iva anupavisati dukūla cumbaṭakena ati

original: ganthitvā gahitadukūlavatthena.
analyzed: ganthitvā gahita dukūla vatthena

original: Nāgavikkantacāraṇoti hatthināgasadisapadanikkhepo. Satapuññalakkhaṇoti anekasatapuññābhinibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇo.
analyzed: nāga vikkanta cāraṇo ti hatthi nāga sadisa pada nikkhepo sata puñña lakkhaṇo ti aneka sata puñña abhinibbatta mahā purisa lakkhaṇo

original: Maṇiverocano yathāti caturāsītisahassamaṇiparivārito ativiya virocamāno vijjotamāno
analyzed: maṇi verocanaḥ yathā ati catur āsīti sahassa maṇi parivāritaḥ ativiya virocamānaḥ vijjotamānaḥ

original: maṇi viya. “Verocano nāma eko maṇī”ti keci. Mahāsālovāti mahanto sālarukkho viya,
analyzed: maṇi viya verocanaḥ nāma ekaḥ maṇī iti keci mahā sāla uvāti mahantaḥ sāla rukkhaḥ viya

original: suddhaṭṭhito koviḷārādi mahārukkho viya vā. Padumo kokanado yathāti kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: suddha ṭṭhitaḥ koviḷāra ādi mahā rukkhaḥ viya vā padumaḥ kokanadaḥ yathā iti kokanada saṅkhātam

original: mahāpadumaṃ viya, vikasamānapadumaṃ viya vā.
analyzed: mahā padumam viya vikasamāna padumam viya vā

original: Ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viyātiādi tassā pakiṇṇakakathāya aññesaṃ sudukkarabhāvadassanañceva
analyzed: ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārentaḥ viya atiādi tassā pakiṇṇaka kathāya aññesam su dukkara bhāva dassanam ca eva

original: suṇantānaṃ accantasukhāvahabhāvadassanañca. Pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viyāti nāḷiyantaṃ
analyzed: suṇantānam accanta sukha āvaha bhāva dassanam ca pathavojam ākaḍḍhantaḥ viyāti nāḷiyantam

original: yojetvā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale pappaṭakojaṃ uddhaṃ mukhaṃ katvā ākaḍḍhanto viya.
analyzed: yojetvā mahā pathaviyāḥ heṭṭhima tale pappaṭaka ujam uddham mukham katvā ākaḍḍhantaḥ viya

original: Yojanikanti yojanapamāṇaṃ. Madhubhaṇḍanti madhupaṭalaṃ.
analyzed: yojana pamāṇam madhu bhaṇḍanti madhu paṭalam

original: Mahantanti vipulaṃ uḷārapuññaṃ. Sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hotīti sabbameva paccayajātaṃ
analyzed: mahantam ti vipulam uḷāra puññam sabba dānam dinnam eva hoti iti sabbam eva paccaya jātam

original: āvāsadāyakena dinnameva hoti. Tathā hi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā
analyzed: āvāsa dāyakena dinnam eva tathā hi dve tayaḥ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci

original: āgatassapi chāyūdakasampannaṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nhāyitvā paṭissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā
analyzed: āgatassa api chāyūdaka sampannam ārāmam pavisitvā nhāyitvā paṭissaye muhuttam nipajjitvā

original: uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti. Bahi vicarantassa ca
analyzed: uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balam āharitvā pakkhittam viya hoti bahi vicarantassa ca

original: kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi kilamati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ
analyzed: kāye vaṇṇa dhātu vāta ātapehi kilamati paṭissayam pavisitvā dvāram pidhāya muhuttam

original: nisinnassa visabhāgasantati vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati patiṭṭhāti, vaṇṇadhātu āharitvā
analyzed: nisinnassa visabhāga santati sabhāga santati patiṭṭhāti vaṇṇa dhātu āharitvā

original: pakkhittā viya hoti, bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭakā vijjhanti, khāṇu paharati,
analyzed: pakkhittā viya hoti bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭakāḥ vijjhanti khāṇu paharati

original: sarīsapādiparissayā ceva corabhayañca uppajjati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya
analyzed: sarīsapa ādi parissayā ca iva cora bhayam ca uppajjati paṭissayam pavisitvā dvāram pidhāya

original: nisinnassa pana sabbepete parissayā na honti. Sajjhāyantassa dhammapītisukhaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nisinnassa pana sabbepete parissayāḥ na honti sajjhāyantassa dhamma pīti sukham kammaṭṭhānam

original: manasikarontassa upasamasukhaṃ uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato. Bahi vicarantassa
analyzed: manasikarontassa upasama sukham uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepa abhāvataḥ bahi vicarantassa

original: ca kāye sedā muccanti, akkhīni phandanti, senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe mañcapīṭhādīni
analyzed: ca kāye sedāḥ muccanti akkhīni phandanti senāsanam pavisana kkhaṇe mañca pīṭha ādīni

original: na paññāyanti, muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti,
analyzed: na paññāyanti muhuttam nisinnassa pana akkhi pasādaḥ āharitvā pakkhittaḥ viya hoti

original: dvāravātapānamañcapīṭhādīni paññāyanti. Etasmiñca āvāse vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi
analyzed: dvāra vāta pāna mañca pīṭha ādīni paññāyanti etasmin ca āvāse vasantam disvā manussā catūhi

original: paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “āvāsadānasmiñhi dinne sabbadānaṃ
analyzed: paccayehi sakkaccam upaṭṭhahanti tena vuttam āvāsa dānasmin hi dinne sabba dānam

original: dinnameva hotī”ti. Bhūmaṭṭhaka…pe… na sakkāti ayamattho mahāsudassanavatthunā dīpetabbo.
analyzed: dinnam eva hoti iti na sakkā iti ayam atthaḥ mahāsudassana vatthunā dīpetabbo

original: Mātukucchi asambādhova hotīti ayamattho antimabhavikānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhivasena dīpetabbo.
analyzed: mātukucchi asambādhaḥ va hoti iti ayam atthaḥ antimabhavikānam mahā bodhisattānam paṭisandhi vasena dīpetabbo

original: Sītanti ajjhattaṃ dhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhā utuvipariṇāmavasena vā uppajjanakasītaṃ.
analyzed: sītam ti ajjhattam dhātu khobha vasena vā bahiddhā utu vipariṇāma vasena vā uppajjanaka sītam

original: Uṇhanti aggisantāpaṃ, tassa ca davadāhādīsu sambhavo daṭṭhabbo. Paṭihantīti paṭihanati.
analyzed: uṇhanti aggi santāpam tassa ca dava dāha ādīsu sambhavaḥ daṭṭhabbo paṭihanti iti paṭihanati

original: Yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ ābādho na hanati, evaṃ karoti. Sītuṇhabbhāhate
analyzed: yathā ābādhaḥ na hanati evam karoti

original: hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti. Vāḷamigānīti sīhabyagghādivāḷamige.
analyzed: hi sarīre vikkhitta cittaḥ bhikkhu yonisas padahitum na sakkoti vāḷamigāni iti sīha byaggha ādi vāḷamige

original: Guttasenāsanañhi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā na honti. Sarīsapeti
analyzed: gutta senāsanam hi pavisitvā dvāram pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayāḥ na honti sarīsape ti

original: ye keci sarantā gacchante dīghajātike sappādike aññe ca tathārūpe. Makaseti nidassanamattametaṃ,
analyzed: ye keci sarantā gacchante dīgha jātike sappa ādike aññe ca tathārūpe makasā iti nidassanam attam etam

original: ḍaṃsādīnaṃ eteneva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sisireti sītakālavasena sattāhavaddalikādivasena
analyzed: ḍaṃsa ādīnam etena iva saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo sisirā iti sīta kāla vasena satta aha vat dalikā ādi vasena

original: ca uppanne sisirasamphasse. Vuṭṭhiyoti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanatīti yojanā.
analyzed: ca uppanne sisira samphasse vuṭṭhiyā ti yadā tadā uppannā vassa vuṭṭhiyo paṭihanati iti yojanā

original: Vātātapo ghoroti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ubbahanabhañjanādivasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajaarajādibhedo
analyzed: vāta ātapaḥ ghoraḥ iti rukkha gaccha ādīnam ubbahana bhañjana ādi vasena pavattiyā ghoraḥ saraja araja ādi bhedo

original: vāto ceva gimhapariḷāhasamayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriyātapo ca. Paṭihaññatīti paṭibāhīyati.
analyzed: vātaḥ ca iva gimha pariḷāha samayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriya ātapo ca paṭihaññati iti paṭibāhīyati

original: Leṇatthanti nānārammaṇato cittaṃ nivattitvā paṭisallāṇārāmatthaṃ. Sukhatthanti vuttaparissayābhāvena
analyzed: leṇa attham ti nānā ārammaṇataḥ cittam nivattitvā paṭisallāṇa ārāma attham sukha attham ti vutta parissaya abhāvena

original: phāsuvihāratthaṃ. Jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanibandhitvā
analyzed: phāsu vihāra attham jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittam upanibandhitvā

original: samādahanavasena jhāyituṃ. Vipassitunti aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasituṃ.
analyzed: samādahana vasena jhāyitum vipassitum ti anicca ādi vasena saṅkhāre sammasitum

original: Vihāreti paṭissaye. Kārayeti kārāpeyya. Rammeti manorame. Vāsayettha bahussuteti
analyzed: vihāre iti paṭissaye kāraya iti kārāpeyya ramme iti manorame vāsayettha bahu ssuta iti

original: kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya. Te nivāsento
analyzed: kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahu ssute sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme nivāseyya te nivāsento

original: pana tesaṃ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti. Evaṃ annañca pānañca vatthasenāsanāni
analyzed: pana tesam bahu ssutānam yathā paccayehi kilamathaḥ na hoti evam annam ca pānam ca vattha senāsanāni

original: ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu ajjhāsayasampannesu kammaphalānaṃ ratanattayaguṇānañca saddahanena
analyzed: ca dadeyya uju bhūtesu ajjhāsaya sampannesu kamma phalānam saddahanena

original: vippasannena cetasā. Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ “te tassā”ti
analyzed: vippasannena cetasā idāni gahaṭṭha pabbajitānam aññamaññu upakāra tam dassetum te tassa iti

original: gāthamāha. Tattha teti bahussutā. Tassāti upāsakassa. Dhammaṃ desentīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhapanūdanaṃ
analyzed: gātham āha tattha te iti bahu ssutā tassa ati upāsakassa dhammam desenti iti sakala vaṭṭa dukkha panūdanam

original: niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ kathenti. Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti so puggalo yaṃ saddhammaṃ
analyzed: niyyānikam dhammam kathenti yam so dhammam idhaññāyāti so puggalo yam saddhammaṃ

original: imasmiṃ sāsane sammāpaṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamena anāsavo hutvā parinibbāyati.
analyzed: imasmim sāsane sammā paṭipajjanena jānitvā agga magga adhigamena anāsavaḥ hutvā parinibbāyati

original: Āvāseti āvāsadāne. Ānisaṃsoti udrayo. Pūjāsakkāravasena paṭhamayāmo khepito, satthu
analyzed: āvāse iti āvāsa dāne ānisaṃso ti udrayo pūjā sakkāra vasena paṭhama yāmo khepito satthu

original: dhammadesanāya appāvaseso majjhimayāmo gatoti pāḷiyaṃ “bahudeva ratti”nti vuttanti
analyzed: dhamma desanāya appa avasesaḥ majjhima yāmaḥ gataḥ ti pāḷiyam vuttan ti

original: āha “atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāma”nti. Saṅgahaṃ nārohati vipulavitthārabhāvato. Buddhānañhi
analyzed: āha atirekataram saṅgaham na ārohati vipula vitthāra bhāvataḥ

original: bhattānumodanāpi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuccamānā dīghamajjhimapamāṇāpi hoti. Tathā hi
analyzed: bhatta anumodanā api thokam vaḍḍhetvā vuccamānā dīgha majjhima pamāṇā api hoti tathā hi

original: suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, jivhā tanukā, bhavaṅgaparivāso paritto, natthi vegāyitaṃ,
analyzed: su phusitam danta āvaraṇam jivhā tanukā bhavaṅga parivāso parittaḥ natthi vegāyitam

original: natthi vitthāyitaṃ, natthi abyāvaṭamano, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ samupabyūḷhaṃ, aparikkhayā paṭisambhidā.
analyzed: natthi vitthāyitam natthi a byāvaṭa manaḥ sabbaññu ta ññāṇam samupabyūḷham a parikkhayā paṭisambhidā

original: Sandassetvātiādīsu sandassetvā āvāsadānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā. Tato
analyzed: sandassetvā ati ādīsu sandassetvā āvāsa dāna paṭisaṃyuttam dhammim katham katvā tatas

original: paraṃ, mahārāja, itipi sīlaṃ, itipi samādhi, itipi paññāti sīlādiguṇe tesaṃ sammā
analyzed: param mahā rāja itipi sīlam itipi samādhi itipi paññā ati sīla ādi guṇe tesam sammā

original: dassetvā hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhato pakāsetvā. Samādapetvāti evaṃ sīlaṃ samādātabbaṃ,
analyzed: dassetvā hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhatas pakāsetvā samādapetvā ati evam sīlam samādātabbam

original: sīle patiṭṭhitena evaṃ samādhipaññā bhāvetabbāti yathā te sīlādiguṇe sammā ādiyanti,
analyzed: sīle patiṭṭhitena evam samādhi paññā bhāvetabbā ati yathā te sīla ādi guṇe sammā ādiyanti

original: tathā gaṇhāpetvā. Samuttejetvāti yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hoti, samathavipassanā
analyzed: tathā gaṇhāpetvā samuttejetvā ati yathā samādinnam sīlam su visuddham hoti samatha vipassanā

original: ca bhāviyamānā yathā suṭṭhu visodhitā uparūpari visesāvahā honti, evaṃ samuttejetvā
analyzed: ca bhāviyamānāḥ yathā suṭṭhu visodhitāḥ upari upari visesa āvahāḥ honti evam samuttejetvā

original: nisāmanavasena vodāpetvā. Sampahaṃsetvāti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ṭhitasīlādiguṇehi sampati
analyzed: nisāmana vasena vā udāpetvā sampahaṃsetvā iti yathānusiṭṭham ṭhita sīla ādi guṇehi

original: paṭiladdhaguṇānisaṃsehi ceva upariladdhabbaphalavisesehi ca cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā
analyzed: paṭiladdha guṇa anisaṃsehi ca iva upari laddhabba phala visesehi ca cittam sampahaṃsetvā

original: laddhassāsavasena suṭṭhu tosetvā. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Sakyarājāno
analyzed: suṭṭhu tosetvā evam etesam padānam atthaḥ veditabbo sakya rājāno

original: yebhuyyena bhagavato dhammadesanāya sāsane laddhassādā laddhappatiṭṭhā ca.
analyzed: yebhuyyena bhagavataḥ dhamma desanāya sāsane laddha ssādā laddha ppatiṭṭhā ca

original: Upasaggasaddānaṃ anekatthattā abhi-saddo ati-saddena samānatthopi hotīti vuttaṃ “abhikkantāti atikkantā”ti.
analyzed: upasagga saddānam aneka attha ttā abhi saddaḥ ati saddena samāna atthaḥ api hoti iti vuttam abhikkantā ati atikkantā ati

original: Tatra kirātiādi kecivādoti baddhopi na hoti. Tenāha “akāraṇameta”ntiādi. Kāyacittalahutādayo
analyzed: tatra kirāti ādi baddhaḥ api na tena āha akāraṇam etat iti ādi

original: uppajjantīti idaṃ kāyikacetasikaaññathābhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, lahutādiuppanne savanānuttariyapaṭilābhena
analyzed: uppajjanti iti idam kāyika cetasika aññathābhāvassa kāraṇa vacanam lahu tā ādi uppanne savana anuttariya paṭilābhena

original: laddhabbadhammatthavedasamadhigamato. Vuttañhetaṃ –
analyzed: laddhabba dhamma attha veda samadhigamataḥ vuttam ha etam

original: “Yathā, yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniko sabrahmacārī,
analyzed: yathā yathā āvuso bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammam deseti aññataraḥ vā garuṭṭhānikaḥ sabrahmacārī

original: tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojja”ntiādi.
analyzed: tathā tathā saḥ tasmin dhamme labhati attha vedam labhati dhamma vedam labhati dhamma upasaṃhitam pāmojjanti ādi

original: Piṭṭhivāto uppajji upādinnasarīrassa tathārūpattā saṅkhārānañca aniccatāya dukkhānubandhattā.
analyzed: piṭṭhivātaḥ uppajji upādinna sarīrassa tathārūpa ttā saṅkhārā nañca anicca tāya dukkha anubandha ttā

original: Akāraṇaṃ vā etanti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ “pahotī”tiādi
analyzed: akāraṇam vā etat ti yena adhippāyena vuttam tam eva adhippāyam vivaritum pahoti itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ pahoti yathā taṃ veluvagāmake. Ettake ṭhāneti ettake
analyzed: vuttam eka pallaṅkena nisīditum yathā tam veluva gāmake ettake ṭhāne iti ettake

original: ṭhāne ṭhānaṃ nipphannanti yojanā. Tañca khoti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ. Dhammakathaṃ
analyzed: ṭhāne ṭhānam nipphannanti yojanā tat ca kho ti vuṭṭhāna saññam citte ṭhapanam dhamma katham

original: suṇamāno dhammagāravena.

analyzed: ñāṇa ppavattīhi navahi samādhi cariyāhi iti aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ aṭṭha samādhi cariyā tāsam

analyzed: rāga paṇidhi ādīnam abhāvataḥ sesam vutta nayam eva tena āha animitta paṇihitesu pi esā iva

original: aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalo seyyathāpi pādasikā. Piṇḍagaṇanāyāti saṅkalanapaṭuppannakārino
analyzed: aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalaḥ sā iyyathā api pādasikā piṇḍa gaṇanāya ati saṅkalana paṭuppanna kārinaḥ

original: piṇḍavasena gaṇanā. Tathāgatoti khīṇāsavo, tathāgataṃ sandhāya pucchatīti khīṇāsavoti
analyzed: piṇḍa vasena gaṇanā tathāgato ti khīṇāsavo tathāgatam sandhāya pucchati iti khīṇāsavaḥ iti

original: cassa arahattaphalavasibhāvitakhandhe upādāya ayaṃ paññatti hoti. Tesu khandhesu
analyzed: cassa arahatta phala vasi bhāvita khandhe upādāya ayam hoti tesu khandhesu

original: sati khīṇāsavā sattasaṅkhātā hontīti vohārena paññapetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya, asantesu
analyzed: sati khīṇa āsavā satta saṅkhātāḥ honti iti vohārena paññapetum sakkā bhaveyya a santesu

original: na sakkā, tasmā paraṃ maraṇāti vuttattā tesaṃ abhāvā “abyākatameta”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi
analyzed: na sakkā tasmā param maraṇā ti vutta ttā tesam abhāvā abyākatam etat ti vuttam yadi

original: evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvato “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti puṭṭhāya “āmā”ti paṭijānitabbā
analyzed: evam tesam abhāvataḥ na hoti tathāgato param maraṇā ti puṭṭhāya āmā ti paṭijānitabbā

original: siyā, taṃ pana sattasaṅkhātassa pucchitattā na paṭiññātanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yena rūpenāti
analyzed: siyā tam pana satta saṅkhātassa pucchita ttā na paṭiññātan ti daṭṭhabbam yena rūpena ati

original: sattatathāgate vuttarūpaṃ sabbaññutathāgate paṭikkhipituṃ “taṃ rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: satta tathāgate vutta rūpam sabbaññu tathāgate paṭikkhipitum tam rūpam tiādi vuttam

original: Yaṃ upādāyāti yaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. Tadabhāvenāti tassa khandhapañcakassa
analyzed: yam upādāya ati yam khandha pañcakam upādāya tad abhāvena ati tassa khandha pañcakassa

original: abhāvena. Tassā paññattiyāti sattapaññattiyā abhāvaṃ. Niruddhaṃ na nidasseti.
analyzed: abhāvena tassā paññattiyā ati satta paññattiyāḥ abhāvam niruddham na nidasseti

original: Khemāya theriyā vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ suttaṃ bhagavato seṭṭhatthadīpanato aggapadāvacaraṃva hotīti vuttaṃ “aggapadasmi”nti.
analyzed: khemāya theriyā vuttam paṭhamam suttam bhagavataḥ seṭṭha ttha dīpanataḥ agga pada avacaram va hoti iti vuttam agga padasmin ti

original: Khemāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: khemā sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Anurādhasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anurādha sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 411. Idha saḷāyatanavagge saṅgāyanavasena saṅgītikārehi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idha saḷāyatana vagge saṅgāyana vasena saṅgīti kārehi vuttam

original: 3-8. Paṭhamasāriputtakoṭṭhikasuttādivaṇṇanā
412-417. Rūpamattanti ettha matta-saddo visesanivattiattho. Ko pana so visesoti? Yo bāhiraparikappito idha tathāgatoti vuccamāno attā. Anupalabbhiyasabhāvoti anupalabbhiyattā.
analyzed: rūpa mattanti ettha matta saddaḥ visesa nivatti atthaḥ kaḥ pana saḥ visesaḥ ti yaḥ bāhira parikappitaḥ idha tathāgato ti vuccamānaḥ attā anupalabbhiya sabhāvaḥ ti

original: Paṭhamasāriputtakoṭṭhikasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama sāriputta koṭṭhika sutta ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 9. Kutūhalasālāsuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kutūhalasālā sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 418. Nānāvidhanti taṃtaṃdiṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ aññampi vā nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ.
analyzed: nānāvidhanti tat tat diṭṭhi vāda paṭisaṃyuttam aññam pi vā nānāvidham tiracchāna katham

original: Bahūnaṃ kutūhaluppattiṭṭhānatoti yojanā. Yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchatīti agginā
analyzed: bahūnam kutūhala uppatti ṭṭhānato ti yojanā yāvaḥ ābhassara brahmalokā gacchati iti agginā

original: kappavuṭṭhānakāle gacchati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Imañca kāyanti imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ. Cuticittena
analyzed: kappa vuṭṭhāna kāle gacchati tam sandhāya vuttam imam ca imam rūpa kāyam cuti cittena

original: nikkhipatīti cuticittena bhijjamānena nikkhipati. Cuticittassa hi oraṃ sattarasamassa
analyzed: nikkhipati iti cuti cittena bhijjamānena nikkhipati cuti cittassa hi oram sattarasamassa

original: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ cuticittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati, tato
analyzed: cittassa uppāda khaṇe uppannam kamma ja rūpam cuti cittena saddhim nirujjhati tatas

original: paraṃ kammajarūpaṃ na uppajjati. Yadi uppajjeyya, maraṇaṃ na siyā, cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: param kamma ja rūpam na uppajjati yadi uppajjeyya maraṇam na siyā cuti cittam rūpam

original: na samuṭṭhāpeti, āhārajassa ca asambhavo eva, utujaṃ pana vattateva. Yasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: na samuṭṭhāpeti āhāra jassa ca asambhavaḥ eva utu jam pana yasmā paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: satto aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma, cutikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ aladdhaṃ aññataraṇāya,
analyzed: sattaḥ aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma cuti kkhaṇe paṭisandhi cittam a laddham aññataraṇāya

original: tasmā vuttaṃ “cutikkhaṇe…pe… hotī”ti.
analyzed: tasmā vuttam cuti khaṇepe hoti iti

original: Kutūhalasālāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kutūhalasālā sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 10. Ānandasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ānanda sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 419. Tesaṃ laddhiyāti tesaṃ sassatavādānaṃ laddhiyā saddhiṃ etaṃ “atthattā”ti vacanaṃ
analyzed: tesam laddhiyā ti tesam sassata vādānam laddhiyā saddhim etam atthattā ati vacanam

original: ekaṃ abhavissa. Tato eva anulomaṃ taṃ nābhavissa ñāṇassāti asāraṃ etanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ekam abhavissa tatas eva anulomam tam na abhavissa ñāṇassa ati asāram etat ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Api nu metassāti me etassa anattāti vipassanāñāṇassa anulomaṃ api nu abhavissa, vilomakameva tassa siyāti attho.
analyzed: api nu mā itassa ati me etassa anattā ati vipassanā ñāṇassa anulomam api nu abhavissa vilomakam eva tassa siyāti attho

original: Ānandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ānanda sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 11. Sabhiyakaccānasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sabhiya kaccāna sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 420. Yassapa’ssāti pāṭhassa ayaṃ piṇḍattho “āvuso”tiādi. Tatthāyaṃ sambandho – āvuso,
analyzed: pāṭhassa ayam piṇḍa atthaḥ āvuso ti ādi tattha ayam sambandhaḥ āvuso

original: yassapi puggalassa tīṇi vassāni vuṭṭho, ettakena kālena “hetumhi sati rūpītiādipaññāpanā
analyzed: yassa api puggalassa tīṇi vassāni vuṭṭhaḥ ettakena kālena hetumhi sati rūpī iti ādi paññāpanā

original: hoti, asati na hotī”ti ettakaṃ byākaraṇaṃ bhaveyya, tassa puggalassa ettakameva bahu,
analyzed: hoti asati na hoti iti ettakam byākaraṇam bhaveyya tassa puggalassa ettakam eva bahu

original: ko pana vādo atikkante! Ito atikkante dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva vattabbameva natthīti
analyzed: kaḥ pana vādaḥ atikkante itas atikkante dhamma desanā naye vādoya iva vattabbam eva natthi iti

original: therassa pañhabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā paribbājako pītisomanassaṃ pavedesi.
analyzed: therassa pañha byākaraṇam sutvā paribbājakaḥ pīti somanassam pavedesi

original: Sabhiyakaccānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sabhiya kaccāna sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: sārattha ppakāsiniyā saṃyutta nikāya aṭṭhakathāya
